类 PreparationStep

java.lang.Object
dao.mappers.PreparationStep
public class PreparationStep extends Object
PreparationStep entity class representing a single step in recipe preparation. This class contains information about individual cooking instructions for a recipe.
从以下版本开始:
1.0

  • 构造器详细资料

    • PreparationStep

      public PreparationStep()
      Default constructor for PreparationStep. Creates an empty PreparationStep object.

    • PreparationStep

      public PreparationStep(int recipeId, int step, String description)
      Parameterized constructor for PreparationStep.
      参数:
      recipeId - the ID of the recipe this step belongs to
      step - the step number in the preparation sequence
      description - the detailed description of this preparation step
